column2: 虚弱的，（走路）不稳的：weak and unsteady；无法思考的，头脑不清的：not able to think or move
怨恨，仇恨：ill will
（尤指低声地）抱怨，埋怨：complain
不感兴趣的，不热情的：lacking heart
起哄，使难堪：harass
分等级的，等级制的：classified
跛行，蹒跚而行：haltingly or with difficulty；阻碍，妨碍：hamper the action
千篇一律，单调：lack of variety；无聊的，乏味的：lacking excitement
羞辱，使丧失尊严：to a lower position
假设，前提条件：starting point；假定的：assumption speculation
独特而奇怪的习惯：odd or peculiar habit
闲置的，未使用的：not turned to use；懒散的：lazy；懒散度日，无所事事：without working
没有教养的，没有礼貌的：impolite
著名的，杰出的：distinguished
不能被摧毁的：impossible to destroy；不朽的，永恒的：occurring forever
不言而喻的，心照不宣的：understood though unexpressed；无疑问的，无保留的：without doubt
冒名顶替者，骗子：assumes false identity
免责，免受处罚：freedom from punishment
刺激，诱因：incites
义不容辞的，必须的：obligation duty
不合礼节的，不得体的：conflicting with accepted standards
违背，违反：failure to uphold the requirements
证明...的合理性，为...辩解：prove to be just, right
最终的，最后的：following all others；缓慢行走：slowness；萎靡，失去活力：lose bodily strength
长矛，标枪：long straight handle and sharp head or blade；刺穿，刺破：penetrate
松弛的，不紧的，不严格的：not tense, firm, or rigid；懈怠的，漫不经心的：failing to give proper care
许可，认可：approval；自由：move freely；放荡：disregard for standards；准许，授权使用：permit or authorize
追捧，把...捧为名人：celebrity
荒唐的，可笑的：derisive laughter
发光的，有光泽的：emitting or reflecting light；杰出的：standing above
恐怖的：令人反感的：causing revulsion；面色苍白的，病态的：pale in appearance
诡计：scheming or crafty action
热爱冒险的人：seeks our very dangerous or foolhardy adventures；大胆的，鲁莽的：foolishly adventurous or bold
重要，重大：greatness in significance；巨大：greatness in size
恶意的，恶毒的：vicious ill will, spite, hatred
恶毒的，邪恶的：desire to cause someone pain
巧妙地操纵：guide with adroitness and design
边缘的：near a border；不重要的：not of central importance
思索，沉思：focus
仆人，奴仆：servant；卑贱的，低下的：spirit of humility or unseemly submissiveness
艳俗的，俗气的：vulgar manner
环境，氛围：physical or social setting
军事的，军用的：soldiers, arms, or war
错误的理解、判断：failure to understand；wrong judgment
君主，帝王：rules；巨头，大亨：person of rank, power, or influence
垄断，主宰：complete control
彻底放松的状态：disregardful or unconscious；天堂，极乐世界：utter perfection and happiness
思乡之情：homesick；怀旧，怀念：sentimental yearning for return
（尤指因为丑闻而出名的）名人：widely known something bad；坏名声：ill fame
养育，培养：provide with food；培养，促进：help with growth
新手，初学者：new
（尤指法律条文等正式的）废除，废弃：doing away
失去感觉的：devoid of sensation；麻木的，无感情的：devoid of emotion
愚蠢的人：stupid person
警惕的，警觉的：paying close attention；严格遵守（规章、制度或原则）的：observing
过时的，被淘汰的：no longer useful
攻击，进攻：attack, assault；起始，开始：begins
严峻的考验：severe trial
表面上的，佯装的：appearing to be true
结果，后果：traceable to a cause
过时的，废弃的：no longer usable
不顾：set aside
使变黯淡：make dark, dim；（在重要性上）超越，超过：exceed in importance
淹没：cover；（感情上、精神上）使无所适从，使难以忍受：subject to mental stress
十分激动的，非常不安的：agitation；（装饰、文风等）过分华丽的：excessively decorated
对话，交流：exchange of views；闲聊：profusely or idly
（有节奏的）舒张收缩：expanding and contracting
万能药，万灵药：remedy for all ills
特征，特点：distinguishing characteristic
教学的；教师的：teacher or education
剥去...的皮：strip off；脱去（衣服等）：take off clothes
敏锐的：sense slight differences；洞察力强的：deep understanding
危险的：potential loss or injury
额外的好处：given in addition
易怒的，爱发脾气的：easily irritated
扩荒者，先驱者：first to settle；最初的，最早的：coming before；开创，创造：open up
（信仰上）虔诚的：devotion to divine worship；忠诚的：firm in one's allegiance
陷阱：capture and hold animals；（不易察觉的）危害：hidden danger
最关键的，最为重要的：greatest possible importance
宁静的，风平浪静的：free from storms；冷静的，淡定的：free from agitation
爱开玩笑的，好打闹的：joking or teasing
平民的，社会下层：low social or economic rank
丰富，充沛：more than sufficient；大量：considerable amount
行走缓慢的人：moves slowly
（味道等）浓郁的：abundance quality；奢华的，豪华的：notably luxurious
水煮：cook in a liquid
（仪表上的）指针：scale indicator；忠告，建议：suggestion or hint
实用主义的，务实的：practical approach
预谋：think about beforehand
先决条件，前提：necessary to an end
特权，权力：right, power, privilege
宣告，使...公之于众：declare publicly
方案，计划：specific plan；凸出：extend outward；预测，预计：based on present data or trends
所有权：ownership；私营的：privately owned
原型：original model
（植物）生长茂盛的：growing thickly；猖獗的，不受限制的：occurring without restraint
食量大的，贪食的；贪婪的：huge appetite
实践，履行（诺言等）：required；改过自新：make better
令人身心振奋的，提神的：renewing effect
残余，剩余物：left over
